dynamic_methods.source_code:
@property
    def post(self) -> int | None:
        """The post-release number of the version.

        >>> print(Version("1.2.3").post)
        None
        >>> Version("1.2.3.post1").post
        1
        """
        return self._version.post[1] if self._version.post else None
